location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Dow, Assistant Surgeon, Temporarily in Charge of the Residency, Bushire, to Captain Charles J Maillard, Acting Political Agent at Keshme [Qeshm]

mods.abstract: In this letter, James Dow, Assistant Surgeon, temporarily in charge of the Residency, acknowledges the receipt of Charles J Maillard's letter, dated 29 July, which mentioned the removal of British troops from Rasselkhyma [Ra's al-Khaymah] to the Island of Keshme [Qeshm] and the fact that Maillard has succeeded Captain Thomas Perronet Thompson as a Political Agent at the new settlement in the Gulf. Dow promises to report any intelligence that he may receive regarding the Wahabee [Wahhābī] tribes.
